option.blocketleagueutils.disablethirdpe: Disables the third person front view (double F5) that serves no purpose in Blocket League
option.blocketleagueutils.camerasmooth.t: How smooth the camera move to the ball position (0 = slow & smooth, 1 = fast & rigid)
option.blocketleagueutils.camerapitchdeg: The pitch degree to add when Ball Cam is active to avoid obstructed views by player model (-90 to 90)
option.blocketleagueutils.showhud.name: Show HUD on Ball Cam
option.blocketleagueutils.showhud.toolti: A simple HUD that shows when Ball Cam is active
option.blocketleagueutils.ballitem.name: Ball block
option.blocketleagueutils.ballitem.toolt: Item/block used by the datapack to represent the ball (default: minecraft:target), used to identify the ball for ball cam
option.blocketleagueutils.showballmarker: Show a marker on the ground below the ball to help locate it when it's in the air
option.blocketleagueutils.ballmarkerradi: The radius of the ball marker circle, in blocs
option.blocketleagueutils.ballmarkerthic: The thickness of the ball marker circles, in blocs
option.blocketleagueutils.ballmarkercolo: The color of the ball marker
